question.Title: Extracting questions from docx file using python
question.Body:
I have a Django project in which I want the user to upload a docx file containing questions of MCQ/Fill in The Blanks type. I want to extract these questions and store individual questions in the database.

I have set up the database, but couldn't find anything to extract the questions from the docx file.

I can read the docx file using textract (https://textract.readthedocs.io/en/stable/), which gives me a list of strings. But how do I check whether a string is a question or an option or just an instruction? Do I have to make specific rules to extract the questions, or is there any library in Python that can help me solve this problem?
